'''0.0.19a_05''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 20, 2009, at 01:16 UTC.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P8:16:05 <Notch> Rroff: new client up now, try it''" [...] "''P8:19:57 <Rroff> 19a_05 is the new one?''", "''P8:20:00 <Notch> yes''" (June 20, 2009, 01:16 to 01:20 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Tried to fix a rubber-banding issue.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P8:14:19 <Rroff> higher framerate the rubber band feeling is less noticeable''" [...] "''P8:14:54 <Rroff> slight warpy motion''" (June 20, 2009, 01:14 UTC)</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* The system clock is out of sync.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P8:23:37 <Rroff> the system timer is gaining 1 second for every 3''" [...] "''P8:29:33 <Rroff> when I have the game running the system timer goes nuts''" [...] "''P8:30:55 <Zuriki> Rroff same here''" (June 20, 2009, 01:23 to 01:30 UTC)</ref>
* FPS cap no longer works, and FPS is unlimited again.
